In this episode we (George Hotelling and I, STEPS scholars) interviewed [Dr. Jacob Jones](https://mse.ncsu.edu/people/jljone21/), professor at North Carolina State University. We discussed the vision of the STEPS (Science and Technologies for Phosphorus Sustainability) center and the plan to achieve it.
